channel.title: Achivek - Recruiting
channel.description:
Hello, I am currently recruiting people that are experienced in Java for a new project. This project involves making a stable server and turning it into a server where a stable economy, and bug fixes are our first priority. Most of the topics in the server development section sound encouraging, this thread may not sound encouraging at all, but I have been a C++ programmer for 3 years, I am currently getting used to java, it's pretty much the same cake. I'm aiming on making a server like Dodian for example, where stability and bugs are very important, I am also aiming on making the server official, with a lot of fun things.
Some things to keep in mind : Hosting is not an issue, I currently have 2 PC's, each one of them being a quad core with 4GB ram designed for hosting servers, I do have two other computers, but they are hosting WoW servers with about 1000+ Active users, I run a fiber optic connection.
I used to be a big fan of RS Private Servers, but later in time I lost interest, my interest has returned. If you are interested on making a stable and economy / Skill and PVP based server, to be released officially and make a turn point please do not hesitate. Whoever participates, I strongly encourage you do not work with any other projects while working with Achivek, my past experience tells me allot of conflicts arrive.
-------------------
Keep in mind we are recruiting Java EXPERIENCED Programmers. Once enough people gets accumulated we will have a meeting and a discussion about what source to base it on, and wipeing the source to 0. If you are interested please send me a private message, I have MSN, I will talk and contact you through it.
Total Members :
Gonzfishin

item.title: Achivek - Recruiting
item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

I recommend using Yz’s server base, it’s stable and you can learn something from it. Atleast it’s vetter than most of the servers.

Read full topic

item.title: Achivek - Recruiting
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Alright, but why not start from scratch if you’re deleting everything?

Read full topic

item.title: Achivek - Recruiting
item.dc:creator: @gonzfishin gonzfishin
item.description:
@gonzfishin wrote:

jc22493:

[quote]I’m aiming on making a server like Dodian for example, where stability and bugs are very important, I am also aiming on making the server official, with a lot of fun things.

Dodian is derived from winterLove, which cannot be stable.

@Topic: If you’re ‘wiping the source to 0’, why not start from scratch?[/quote]

It was an example…And I’m not talking about the current shitty dodian leeched based servers, I’m talking about the official dodian and its stability.

Read full topic
